tool_description: Identifies and analyzes inventory discrepancies and conflicts across multiple sales platforms by comparing stock levels, prices, and product information.

platform_inventories.description: Array of inventory data from different platforms

conflict_types.description: Types of conflicts to detect: stock_level, price, availability, product_info

variance_threshold.description: Percentage threshold for considering differences as conflicts

priority_platform.description: Platform to use as reference for conflict detection

ignore_minor_differences.description: Whether to ignore differences below variance_threshold

include_resolved.description: Whether to include previously resolved conflicts in results

sku_mappings.description: SKU mappings from SKU Mapper to match products across platforms

error_messages: Insufficient data: Need inventory data from at least 2 platforms to detect conflicts.
Invalid conflict types: conflict_types must include valid options: stock_level, price, availability, product_info.
Invalid variance threshold: variance_threshold must be between 0 and 100.
Missing SKU mappings: sku_mappings are required to match products across platforms.
Platform data mismatch: Cannot find matching products across platforms using provided SKU mappings.
usage: Provide platform_inventories from multiple sources and sku_mappings from SKU Mapper. Configure conflict_types and variance_threshold based on business requirements.

conflict_details.description: Detailed conflict information in JSON format

severity_levels.description: Conflict severity classifications: critical, high, medium, low
